ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 96
ygData.msgSnippet: I m currently playing Aethyra ( a lvl 16 enchanter) on karana...and also have a lvl 35 mage who is semi-retired on Karana as well. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I'm currently playing Aethyra ( a lvl 16 enchanter) on karana...and also
have a lvl 35 mage who is semi-retired on Karana as well.

-----Original Message-----
From: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com [mailto:EQ_rainbow@onelist.com]
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 4:17 AM
To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Digest Number 96




There are 8 messages in this issue.

Topics in today's digest:

Message: 1
Date: Mon, 6 Dec 1999 07:23:52 -0800 (PST)
From: J Dye <gaelad@...>
Subject: EQ Xegony


Well.. it's December 6th and the list has been pretty
quiet. =) Here's what's up with me...

I sold my account (Gaelad on Xegony) since I didn't
think I was going to be able to play after my hand
surgery (and after losing interest in the game), but
my hand is better so I am starting over. I was just
curious of what servers had the most of "us" that gets
this list--and is there anyone on Xegony?? =)

the enchanter formerly known as Gaelad

Message: 2
Date: Mon, 6 Dec 1999 10:37:24 -0500
From: "David Lari" <kerik@...>
Subject: Re: EQ Xegony

Seems like most people play on Rodcet Nife or Brell Serilis. But the best
thing to do is find out what time(s) people play (and of course what time
zone) and team up with someone whose schedule will fairly closely match
yours. When I was actively playing, I found that only a few of use played at
the same times.

If you decide to start a character on Brell, or if you want my account, let
me know. I will be canceling my account soon and I want to give my stuff to
a guild member, or if anyone wants a level 21 gnomish necro, I'll be glad to
let someone have my account.

Also, still looking for someone to take over as guild leader on Brell. I
have someone who is willing to become the overall owner of the guild and am
going to find out how to transfer it to him, but still need the leader on
Brell.

David

From: J Dye <gaelad@...>

Message: 3
Date: Mon, 6 Dec 1999 10:45:24 EST
From: Degaba2@...
Subject: Re: EQ Xegony



Hello......Aliuden here......i play on Rodcet Knife.........usually
around 7 am to 10 am EST mon thru fri...........and weekends who
knows.......ive also found there are not that many on during the times i
play........if you start a charac on Rodcet ill be glad to help you
out.......currently lvl 19 wiz.....hitting 20 by the weekend ( fingers
crossed)......
hope this helps a little....hope to see you there....
drive safe
drink milk
peace
jeremy ( Aliuden)

Date: Mon, 06 Dec 1999 08:51:28 -0800
From: Jose Muela <redspieder@...>
Subject: Re: EQ Xegony

/guildleader <name> (but then you may already have known that)

Message: 5
Date: Mon, 6 Dec 1999 13:35:26 -0500 (EST)
From: Joseph Normandin <josephn@...>
Subject: Re: EQ Xegony

Hey Gaelad!

The guild is pretty active as far as geouping goes on Rodcet Nife, there
is me (fentus, Pien), my boyfriend (Genesius, Bolas), Taren (Tuttun),
Cabalah, Gwyyn, Damar, Aliuden, Zahira, Lysaies (Kyron, Solinar). Most of
us play at night, whikle some play during the day, and some play all the
fucking time! :) Also, My boyfriend and I have created new chatcters so
we are still low level with them, and there are others that are low level
(Zahira, Lysaies). The rest of us are in our late teens early 20's. I
know you had made a charcters with us before on Rodcet, and I hope you
continue to play with us, we would LOVE to ahve you.

As far as events are concerend, we ahve helped two members so far with
quests and would like to do more, I tried to get a sunday questing thing
going but it hasnt caught on yet, and I've also tried to get a lotto event
going but not much intereste there either. But we do group together all
the time (abnd give eahc other things (thanks to Genesius and Taren for
donations toward my Staff of the Observer fund)). I hope tyo see you on
Rodcet!

love,.
joe

Message: 8
Date: 6 Dec 99 11:50:24 MST
From: Christine Greenwald <chrisRAV4@...>
Subject: Re: [Re: EQ Xegony]

Hi, all-

I would be interested in taking over as guild leader on Brell as Ananda
(gnome
cleric). I am sorry to hear that you are leaving the game as I enjoyed our
short time hunting together, etc. Not to mention, my little cleric could use
some items as well. Ananda is currently an officer as is Reinbeaux (my
partner). I also started a halfling warrior by the name of Mylan.

Let me know what you think. Again, I am so sorry to see you go.


Christine
a/k/a Ananda and Mylan
